Name: KARA Accounting
About the game: Why accounting software? With many bookings you quickly lose track. A software helps you both to archive the bookings in the past and to plan the bookings in the future. This can be very useful. Especially as an entrepreneur or managing director of a GmbH. Get started right away as a layperson You do not need any specialist knowledge because modern software is easy to use and supports you in all important accounting tasks. Save a lot of time and nerves The accounting program automates numerous work processes. In this way you reduce the manual effort to a minimum. No costs for an external professional You save a lot of money because you do the accounting internally.
